div.div: Univ. of Redlands vs. Trinity University
at San Antonio, Texas | Trinity Football

tr.td: Redlands wins the toss, defers. Trinity will receive at the North end.
A. Reyes-Villar kickoff 65 yards to the TUFB00, Adam Saunders return 22 yards to the TUFB22 (N. Manomat-Rodr).
